articles.description: Andra Day's Billie Holiday goes beyond singing the blues – she's living them, experiencing the highs and lows of stardom, abuse and addiction.
articles.content:
USA TODAY's Anika Reed chats with Andra Day, the star of "The United States vs. Billie Holiday," about her portrayal of the iconic singer.
USA TODAY

articles.author: Rob Picheta, CNN
articles.title: 'Frasier' is being rebooted, with Kelsey Grammer reprising the role 17 years after show ended - CNN
articles.description: The hit 90s sitcom "Frasier" is set to return to screens, with Kelsey Grammer reprising his role as radio psychiatrist Frasier Crane in the reboot, ViacomCBS confirmed Wednesday.

articles.title: Bruce Springsteen Pleads Guilty to Drinking in Federal Park - Inside Edition
articles.description: Bruce Springsteen appeared virtually in a New Jersey court Wednesday and pleaded guilty to drinking in a federal park. Springsteen admitted to the judge that...
